text: A sugar cookie or sugar biscuit is a cookie made from sugar, flour, butter, eggs, vanilla, and baking powder or baking soda.Easy Sugar Cookies from Allrecipes.com Retrieved February 12, 2009.Sugar Cookie Recipe from the Food Network Retrieved February 12, 2009. Sugar cookies can be iced with a variety of icings and are normally decorated. == References == Category:Cookies
title: Sugar cookie
